description: Looking for a hiking shoe that doesn't look like a hiking shoe? The Activist pairs trail technology with the look and feel of a sneaker. The lightweight upper is paired with the super-breathable FutureLight waterproof membrane for protection on muddy or dewy trails. The EXTS rubber and lugs ensure you stay upright in slippery and loose terrain.Mesh upper with TPU-overlays for durability without the weight.FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable.Gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Protective toecap adds durability and toe protection, and a TPU heel overlay stabilizes the foot.Removable OrthoLite® Hybrid footbed for underfoot comfort.EVA midsole for lightweight cushion.Sticky EXTS™ outsole provides sure-footing on the trail.
name: The North Face Activist Futurelight Light Trail Shoes - Women's
